Unable to scan Unable to scan image Scan using the camera Scan the code by image "Version: " Scan QR code and Barcode Avoid common mistakes when scanning barcodes No advertising and free Scan QR App 1. To get accurate scan results you need to follow these steps: a. Ensure contrast and no blur. b. The image is not dark or shaded c. The image is not obscured. d. Don\'t zoom too close when scanning. 2. For older phones, the camera resolution will affect the code scanning process. For resolution we recommend using images from the gallery for better optimization during code scanning. If still can\'t scan please reply us via email, " We will solve your problem as soon as possible." " within Wifi coverage, username and password are correct." If you still can\'t connect please " ask your service provider and ask if the code has been changed." 2. If the results show as text, please connect to Wifi " manually with" " android 10 and above devices, due to system limitation." 1. Please make sure you are "1. The application cannot change the content of the code, if the website does not work, it is most likely due to " the website owner. Sorry we can\'t help you with this issue. 2. It could be because the creator of this QR code entered the wrong link, which led to the wrong address. Or it could be that QR code has expired , in this case, "please contact the person who provided your code " to confirm. "3. In some cases, some web pages need " to be opened under special conditions, "such as opening " "with a certain application. " "In this case, please " follow the step-by-step instructions given to you by your QR provider. Tips Code can\'t be read Can\'t connect to Wifi Link is broken Help Other problems "Should: " "Should Not: " Direction 0° Direction 90° Direction 180° Turn on the LED light when dark Other direction Turn on the LED light when light Faint image Low Contrast Please give us more details so we can resolve your issue faster.
